SEARCH

icalibrate 2.3.0 API

The iCalibrate application is for operators at JLab, and assists in ion chamber calibration. The application was originally developed using the Netbeans Matisse form builder for Java Swing.

Usage

The iCalibrate application is distributed in both a zip and tar file. The application requires Java 8 and can be launched on Linux and Windows using the start scripts created by the Gradle build: 


bin/icalibrate(.bat)

Semantic versioning is used (major.minor.patch) where major versions indicate incompatible API changes, minor versions are backwards compatible enhancements, and patch versions are for backwards compatible bug fixes.

Configuration

A Java properties file named icalibrate.properties is located in the config directory. Users can set various configuration parameters there. There is also an epics.properties file which instructs iCalibrate how to connect to EPICS.

Source Code

Can be found on GitHub.

A Gradle build file (build.gradle) is used to compile and package the application.

Packages
Package
Description
org.jlab.icalibrate
Provides the core iCalibrate classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.epics
Provides the iCalibrate EPICS classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.exception
Provides the iCalibrate exception classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.file.io
Provides the file IO classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.model
Provides the iCalibrate object model classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing
Provides the core iCalibrate Swing GUI classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.action
Provides the iCalibrate Swing action classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.action.listener
Provides the iCalibrate Swing action listener classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.chooser
Provides the iCalibrate Swing chooser dialog classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.document
Provides the iCalibrate Swing GUI document model classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.rangeslider
Provides the slider related classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.table.editor
Provides the CellEditor classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.table.model
Provides the iCalibrate Swing GUI table model classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.table.renderer
Provides the iCalibrate Swing table renderer classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.util
Provides the iCalibrate Swing GUI utility classes.
org.jlab.icalibrate.swing.worker
Provides the iCalibrate Swing worker classes.
